name: aibotkit-engineering
description: AI BotKit SaaS + WordPress plugin development workflows. 22 agents, 6 commands, 3 skills. Commands: /full-review (comprehensive multi-agent code review for SaaS and WordPress plugin), /next-phase (21-phase development lifecycle with discovery, gap analysis, SDD methodology, quality gates, test & fix loops, and explicit execution instructions), /deploy-saas (deployment checklist and validation), /test-rag (RAG engine testing workflow), /sync-db (database synchronization workflow), /update-docs (automatic GitBook documentation sync from code). Agents for: Next.js/React standards, RAG engine review, Drizzle schema, Stripe integration, WordPress plugin, security auditing, accessibility compliance, architecture review, documentation sync. Skills for: RAG development patterns, Next.js SaaS architecture, Drizzle ORM patterns.
